thread.title: Fate/Extra Last Encore TV Anime's 2nd Promo Video Streamed
thread.title_full: Fate/Extra Last Encore TV Anime's 2nd Promo Video Streamed

title: Fate/Extra Last Encore TV Anime's 2nd Promo Video Streamed
text:
No account yet? Registering is free , easy , and private . Discuss in the forum, contribute to the Encyclopedia, build your own MyAnime lists, and more. News Fate/Extra Last Encore TV Anime's 2nd Promo Video Streamed posted on 2016-12-31 12:16 EST directs Shaft's series premiering "next winter" 
The official website for the television anime adaptation of the Fate/Extra game began streaming the series' second promotional video on Saturday. The anime, titled Fate/Extra Last Encore , will premiere "next winter." (Note: The official video on the website is region-locked to Japan.) 
The website also revealed a new key visual and more main staff for the anime.
